When did Taylor Swift's Eras tour begin?
March 17, 2023
Where was the first stop of the Eras tour?
State Farm Stadium in Glendale, Arizona
How many fans attended the sold-out show in Glendale?
thousands
What was the duration of the setlist and how many songs were performed?
Three hours and 50 songs
What social media platform were fans discussing the Eras tour and sharing their excitement?
TikTok
What popular TikTok dance did Swift incorporate into her performance?
Bejeweled
Which Taylor Swift album has been the subject of jokes on social media?
Evermore
What was the ticketing issue that led to a Senate hearing?
Ticketmaster's long queues and inflated prices
When will the first leg of the Eras tour end?
Aug. 9
Where will the first leg of the Eras tour end?
SoFi Stadium in Los Angeles
